package.name: musecashacc
package.descrip: Add features related to operating cash accounting method in xTuple ERP.
package.pkgnotes: Add features related to operating cash accounting method in xTuple ERP.

prerequisite.name: xTuple ERP version
prerequisite.query: WITH version AS ( SELECT (SELECT substring(fetchMetricText('ServerVersion'),E'^([[:digit:]]+)\..*'))::integer as major_version, (SELECT substring(fetchMetricText('ServerVersion'),E'^[[:digit:]]+\.([[:digit:]]+)\..*$'))::integer as minor_version, (SELECT substring(fetchMetricText('ServerVersion'),E'^[[:digit:]]+\.[[:digit:]]+\.([[:digit:]]+)'))::integer as patch_version ) SELECT (major_version = 4 AND minor_version = 11 AND patch_version >= 3) OR (major_version = 4 AND minor_version > 11) OR (major_version > 4) FROM version;
prerequisite.message: This package must be installed against xTuple ERP version 4.11.3 or later. This package has only been tested against version 4.11.3 and may not work in later version without updating.

prerequisite.name: Muse Systems xTuple Utilities
prerequisite.query: WITH version AS ( SELECT (SELECT substring(pkghead_version,E'^([[:digit:]]+)\..*'))::integer as major_version, (SELECT substring(pkghead_version,E'^[[:digit:]]+\.([[:digit:]]+)\..*$'))::integer as minor_version, (SELECT substring(pkghead_version,E'^[[:digit:]]+\.[[:digit:]]+\.([[:digit:]]+)'))::integer as patch_version FROM pkghead WHERE pkghead_name = 'musextputils' ) SELECT (major_version = 5 AND minor_version = 0 AND patch_version >= 0) OR (major_version = 5 AND minor_version > 0) OR (major_version > 5) FROM version;
prerequisite.message: This package requires that the Muse Systems xTuple Utilities version 5.0.0 or any higher version 4 series is installed prior to installation of this package.

prerequisite.name: Customer Deposits
prerequisite.query: SELECT true FROM public.metric WHERE metric_name = 'EnableCustomerDeposits' AND substring(lower(metric_value),'^.') = 't';
prerequisite.message: We require that you be using Customer Deposits for processing Cash Receipts.

prerequisite.name: GL Posting
prerequisite.query: SELECT true FROM public.metric WHERE metric_name = 'UseJournals' AND substring(lower(metric_value),'^.') = 'f';
prerequisite.message: We require that transactions post to the General Ledger. We do not support posting transactions to Journals at this time. See Accounting general setup for configuration.

prerequisite.name: Multi-Company
prerequisite.query: SELECT true FROM public.metric WHERE metric_name = 'MultiCompanyFinancialConsolidation' AND metric_value::integer = 0;
prerequisite.message: We do not currently support mutli-company consolidation with this functionality.
